events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The reported issue has been categorized under Refund based on the customer's message about returning the wrong item.
The case has been assigned to agent Jordan for handling the refund request.
Hello, I’m Jordan. I understand you received the wrong item, and I’m here to assist you with your refund.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund accurately?
Sure, my order number is 789456123, and I have attached a photo showing the item I received instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund immediately and send you a prepaid return label for the incorrect item.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate the prepaid return label and the prompt refund processing.
Your refund has been processed, and you should receive confirmation in your email shortly along with the return shipping label.
Checking in to ensure your refund was received and the return process went smoothly. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
We are closing this case as the refund was successfully completed and the customer confirmed satisfaction with the resolution.
